Package model

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMoveToStateFactory
    A general interface for a factory which combines moves and states into new states, i.e., it applies a move to a game board to get the new state of the board.
    IPosition  
    IViewAdapter
    An adapter to the view from the model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IPiece
    Each piece is a host for an extended visitor.
    Model  
    Move
    Represents a move which moves piece to newPosition.
    QuartoMoveToStateFactory
    A factory for applying moves to game boards in the game of Quarto.
    QuartoPiece
    A specific piece class for the game of Quarto.
    QuartoPosition
    This is the representation of board positions specifically for the game of Quarto.
    State
